values:
I went to shoot some hoops the first time in 3 years.. a lil rusty. When i was in high school i bought a basketball.. Everytime something was bothering me, i went to the courts for hours and threw the basketball in the net. there was nothing like the sound of the whoosh of the ball going in that made me feel better. of course most of the time I spent chasing the ball but when i came home everything that was bothering me seemed so clearer.. and my decisions were great.. last time i did this before tonight was when we were evacutating for hurricane ivan. I remember i wasn't the only one shooting hoops that night because nick was outside doing the same thing as i was about to do.... nick was a friend of mine from that year. 

The thing that made me want to go shoot hoops tonight was the things between me and him. I am sick of running i am sick of pushing. I figured he was worth a shot after i told him all the things i have went though he still stayed and told me that everything was cool and no worries.. A few weeks ago i was going though something and i did something i told him i used to do. he told me how I was better then that and that sometimes with life u have to take the ups with the downs. that night after he left I thought everything was cool between us (We got into a fight that monday). I hate fighting with him. I don't do in on purpose. I swear i don't. when we fight I am misrible. I have felt that way twice. We don't always fight or argue.. we actually used to get along great.. 

In high school he once told me something that had to do with being yourself. it was something he wrote in my yearbook. then reminded me of our lunch time discussion. The next year after we graduated I missed him horribly. cause there was no one to really joke around with during down times at  jd. I saw him that year i was shopping in the mall and i remember saying to myself "I hope he doesn't see me" but he did he smiled (that oh so sexy smile) and i returned it. that day i was so happy. i dunno y i felt like i was on cloud nine. 

3 years or so passed.. I was searching around on myspace after kay added me. i had to read his profile cause he had no pictures of him. It sounded like him so i added him as a friend. I posted a picture of me and him at prom just so he knew it was me or something i dunno. 2 nights later we exchanged screen names and phone numbers.  we talked on yahoo for two hours. he told me i never gave him the time of day back in high school. i laughed at all his jokes back then. I remember him giving us a 20 min summary of a scarey movie i remember when he went to hattiesburg for something and entered a contest. I voted for him cause i really wanted him to win... that night after we talked i went to sleep a lil depressed cause i missed him so much and remember how much he made me laugh. 

we talked the next day about some stuff.. then that night i went to dinner I told allison i was not feeling to great because of him. I missed him so much and that made me feel a certain way. she told me a funny story I went back to my room to eat and got on the computer a few mins later i got an im from him my heart when up in my throat. that night we talked on the phone. I told him after that it was so good to hear his voice... 

i came home on the 22nd we planed on going to see a movie.. we went and saw harry potter. i don't remember much about the date but i remember when ever someone asked me how it went all i could say was he kissed me and i could go into detail about that. everything from what was said to how his lips felt. 

the 26th we hung out and watched 2 movies. it was his pick because there's nothing i really wanted to see.. and i was tired and just was like whatever u want to see is great.. the first movie to me was boring. the second one was ok but the thing that made it great was laying in his arms. 

the next time we went out we saw a movie.. it was funny.. not something that i would watch all the time but i'd watch it when i'm down. we talked some more in his car on the way back to my house he dropped his cig and he found it but it was a good laugh.. when he walked me to the door we hugged kissed a few times and joked around. 

the last two times we chilled in my room and i was ok with that. 

sometimes when i go to sleep convos play in my head. or these dates play in my head like i am watching a movie.. monday replays in my head constantly. but its more in slow motion... for a month i felt like i was living someone else's life. cause shit like this just doesn't happen to me. i came to the conculsion tonight that i had something great and i fucked it up.. i tend to do that a lot. but now i am sick of pushing and i still feel the same towards this person as i did on the 22nd of dec.

U told me one time that you would try to give me whatever it was that i wanted. All i ever wanted was u. U would be really happy that i haven't been listening to anyone. I know i was in the wrong.. U told me once that it bothers u that i think we argue.. I tell u i don't want to argue with u but mainly i am just saying ur probably right. U told me on the phone I don't know u. Thats true because the more i opened up and felt comfy with u the less u were with me. It bothered me on monday when u told me that u really liked me. It keeps going back from that. Always has. I didn't know anything until u told me on wednesday that u liked me u took it back less then 3 days later.. 

That day in hattiesburg when we spent two hours on the phone talking. right before u got off the phone u told me u'd call me at 8:30 the next night and i didn't have to wait for ur phone call or anything. I did. because i wanted to hear ur voice. I told kassie that month that it really feels like i was living someone elses life or I was dreaming and i didn't want to wake up. When I went to class after everytime we talked i had a smile on my face for no reason. because for once. i was happy and u made me feel that way. I fell hard for u but i was confused over the fact that i didn't know if it was something i was telling myself to feel or something that was real. I was depressed about school and i let it get to me... I never meant to blow up at u on the phone in fact right after i hung up i was thinking of calling u back. U told me u never know whats bothering me cause i don't tell. When i do tell u whats bothering me this happens.. it happened 2 times not all the time but 2. 

U told me that ur not going to change. I never wanted u to change the one thing that bothered me about u wasn't enough to make me not want to be with u. Because u told me that, that was in the past. I don't always bad mouth u. U can ask anyone that i talk to they know how happy u make me u always have even in high school.. I thought last night of memories from high school and we were talking one day at lunch about online people. and i made the comment when someone asks me sex (as in gender) i say yes please. and u looked at me and repeated it and laughed... that was the first time i ever talked to u. When u weren't asking me to have my 17 kids. we did get along pretty well.. there were times even then that i got on ur bad side (just not as bad). That time u went to Hattiesburg (i think) and u and 2 other guys did that thing for truth.com or something it was some contest. i told u that i hope u lost. I voted for y'all as much as i could cause wow thats talent. I remember one morning i was over talking with phillip and them and u gave us a 20 min thing on scary movies. I never laughed so hard in my life up until a few weeks ago that is. 

that friday u were over here was the only tiime i laughed harder. cause it was so much fun.... sometimes when i did something again it was a lil turn on to hear u get a lil demanding. cause before that its like can i kiss u can i do this.. Always asking damn. LOL... i never lied to u. I wouldn't have told u the things about me if i didn't feel comfy with u. for some reason I was like might as well tell him what he's getting himself into before anything happens just in case. 

when monday happened. all i could say was i hate him so much.. I had to hear no u don't and sad thing was they were right. I can't think of anything that makes me feel that strongly towards u.. I hate fighting with u i really do. I don't do that on purpose I swear to GOD i don't. thats why when we talk in ur car on the phone in person or whatever i say I am not going to argue with u thats only when u start saying No no no christine... 

I know i told u this like 20 million times that i never ask u to defend urself. I ask yes or no questions i need no explaination unless u want to give me one. I mean depending on who u talk to that knows me u might hear everything from i did drugs and got drunk with one guy to i fucked the ftball team..  I quit listening to people that i know that don't like you. kassie told me the other night that she should have those feelings of strong dislike towards u and i shouldn't because atleast u made me happy for awhile. I like how i feel when i am with u. there is nothing that will change that. U honestly make me want to be a better person. I am not this girl that u saw this past week.. i really ain't. I don't care about ex's. I don't care for drama and u know that. I am more flexable and u have seen that. I didn't constantly ask u why u are smiling after i told u once that i am not used to that.. i told u about patience. and u told me about benifit of the doubt and i give u know. I do. I do trust u, if i didn't i don't think i would have went with u to the movies.. when u told me that u tried to make me happy. hun if i wasn't happy being with u then why would i have wanted to see u or agreed to doing things with u? mainly stuff that was more then friends.  
 
I dunno what to say except i hope u do call me so we can talk. -k-

i woke up about 2 weeks ago looked in the mirror and said today is gonna be a good day. I was finally happy. Not because someone made me happy but i remembered something he had said and it made me laugh. 

I woke up a week ago. thought today is gonna be a good day. I looked around. and thought about the night before. He looked at me and told me he liked me. I was excited. Finally to hear those words  i had everything i ever wanted and more. 

I woke up today looked in the mirrior and thought well atleast the sun is shining.. the only thoughts i had was lets see if my computer is working. cause i was having some issues with it last night. 

Last night I reflected on my life. while listening to Tupac. There is something about the song thug manison that makes me wanna medate with lit candles and just not think. That song kind of reflects parts of my life. I had highs and lows. I have highs and lows in friendships/relationships.  

When I thought of the bastard I compared him to. I didn't mean it bad. me and the bastard wasn't really friends and things between me and that ass had a bad ending. 4 times in my life i had been so low and so hard on myself that i cut. I know people care its hard to explain when everyone wants to judge/ offer their advice. I wrote a entry in here sunday jan 22 nd. that was me trying not to do something cause I heard his voice telling me that I am better then that. and remembered how he held me when he was telling me that. I wrote that i was confused when it comes to him. cause its been like hot and cold since dec. 8th. 

I thought the 18th everything was cool when he looked me in the eyes and said I like you. If i knew it was gonna be taken back I wouldn't have felt the way I did. 

I woke up today with the sun shining and went and took a walk. I remembered for a split second what it was like to be on top of the world then a few days later feel like your world has been ripped right from under you.  then I thought of him and how happy he made me. The laughter. the tackling to get a sweatshirt out of my hands. The semi-fighting because somethings he did was a real turn on. LOL. I haven't felt this way towards a person in a long time. its hard for me to let others in because i am afraid that I'm gonna get hurt.. for some reason with him it was different I never felt like he was gonna hurt me and i let him in. I don't regret it. I really don't 

I was talking with a friend of mine last night about how lindsey had a miscarrage.. I feel for her... and I talked a lil about my situation. for the first time i am not confused about how i feel. I really like him and care for him but I can't do anything about anything any more. I am not this person. I know I am not.. I am not verbally jealous. I feel it and then think oh thats stupid. I don't agrue i hate confrontations thats why sometimes i say i don't care. and i do usually mean it... a week ago i was happy. Today I am breathing.. Tomorrow.. i dunno......
i dunno anymore.. i thought I'd feel better but I feel worse..

I wasn't what he wanted. He wasn't what i expected. 

Since I pissed him off after calling all his other girlfriends/flings sluts. we probably ain't talking until he comes back. Also i wouldn't get off the phone when he wanted. he told me to talk to him over the computer cause he couldn't pause his game and was doing 2 things at once. (playing his game/ talking to 10 other people).. I got pissed and said that thing about his other chicks. When he was over here wednesday I kind of felt it. even more so when he was on his phone saying that he's chillin over at his homegurl christina's house. He said it about 4-5 times before he corrected himself. 

Hard feelings i have none. I can't even feel at the moment. i walk around in a daze most of the time have been since that monday i blew up. Its everything negative. Maybe in my mind i didn't want to see the bad. sad thing is i compared him to brady. I'm saying wow right now. I can't believe i said that. I told Candy about the brady comparison and she told me what i already knew. 

We find excuses to back out. Mine was him using drugs in the past. his was my friends/cutting/the way i talked/ coped an attude when i didn't/ negative things. I cut once. I don't always do it. i haven't done it since last monday and am never gonna do it again. I am getting a punching bag soon that way when i feel a certain way i have something there to take my anger out on. I called my father last night for the first time in years and said "thanx for fucking up my life u sorry son of a bitch".

 maybe i should of used his friends as an excuse. its fun to see stuff posted on myspace that leads me to think stuff other then what he says. Also he compared me to a chick that he slept with (personality wise) . I think that was pretty low. because everything he doesn't like about her (personality wise) I am gonna think he doesn't like about me. if i ask him any questions he starts defending himself. I never asked that. I was told back in december "if you hear something about me ask me and i will tell u the truth". that few out the window when I asked him if he does drugs he told me he did and asked if it mattered what he did. then when i didn't answer that question he asked if i was gonna hold it against him. Maybe I should have because he seems to Hold everything against me.  

no matter what i tell him he won't believe me. I knew that for a while. there was a strong:  like and care for him  and i  was willing to except his flaws. but how can i except his flaws when he can't except mine? I am not a perfect person. i told him i was messed up in the beginning. I told him everything i think he needed to know and he said it was fine and everything was peachy when in reality it wasn't. 

I spent 3 hours telling my mom everything thats all i could do.i'm talking every thing. He didn't pop my cherry he stretched it i am sure. it didn't hurt until after he left that day. but that day is gone like everything else is. just a distant memory or a dream. I woke up. I saw things as they really are.. things between us has never been great. we never had that strong of a friendship until recently.. if it lasts i will be amazed. 

 I was crying cause i was hutting.  when ever i feel down i think of all the good times i had  when i was in high school before i moved to mississippi.. and i dream about one of my guy friends and in that 8 hours or so of sleep i am happy and content. and i am gonna go now because i explained everything to him in a lengthy email. and I thought as much as i could I am still confused but it isn't a good confused any more.

umm yea today has been messed up. I dunno how i feel (i say this b/c one min we're talking the next we're just friends i know we're friends first and for most. but how it jumps back and forht gets confusing) .. Things have def. changed from the way they were. I hate it. back decemeber when ever i was online we'd talk. He'd im me while he was playing a game and that used to get on my nerves. He told me that friday we "kicked" it would i rather not have him talk to me at all? 

we talked about what I wanted in a relationship. I want trust and communcation and i was getting that up until i blew up at him on the phone. Then the commuication went down to a minium. I am trying to deal with it. and keep myself  busy so i don't think of him or have the urge to want to talk to him. 

I am trying so hard not to be negitive. I was told no depressing chats, no negitivie thoughts and to keep everything positive. sometimes thats hard. How can i tell him things that he wants to know if he doesn't talk to me in return. sometimes i feel like i'm fast b/c of all the things we have done. I don't regret it but it makes me think wow..

I have two pairs of gauchos soon to get some more cause those things are comfy for running around the house in and wearing when i don't really wanna get dressed but need to type thing.. I came to the desion after the last time not to wear them around him. but then I was thinking I know that will fly out the door like no kissing no cuddling. i enjoy his company but i dunno anything any more.  

I am more depressed over my school situation and to hear my grandma's voice when i told her what i was doing about college sort of got to me tonight and reason why i have thoughts and feeling around 10pm.

 i wish someone told me that this wasn't going to be as bad as it is. where it conserns him  i get told that i fight him. I really don't sometimes i am feeling a certain way at the time and I really don't want to feel that way. I am not mad, sad, crappy, or any other negitive feeling towards him but i wish I got more of a response to things I've said. I actually felt bad last night that one of my friends had to be my entertainment. It wasn't because i was bored I just really wanted to talk to anyone that would listen. not really talk about him or advice or feelings but talk to talk.. talk about the good ole days in high school, talk about things that are going on now. just random thoughts thats how i am with most of my friends.  

with the "if you wanna fix things you wouldn't fight me" I was feeling a certain way in the fact that i didn't want to be that close to have a close personal discussion b/c I was feeling really crappy when he showed up. I didn't even say hi when i saw him.I went and walked half way out to his car and when we hugged all i could say was "i'm sorry". He asked how i knew he was there. I was standing on the porch when his car came up. Then he asked about my pants. Cause he wanted to know how many pairs of gauchos I acutally had and i told him two. We walked into my bedroom He layed half on the bed and then we kind of sat there and agrued over come here. cause he wanted me to straddle him and then lay down (uncomfy when he's feeling frisky lol). we didn't really talk about anything until he saw the cuts on my arm. then He held me in the most uncomfy position and i told him everything so he'd let me up i didn't lie. I did try and thats something i'll admit.. I got up and got something to drink came back sat on the floor while he took up most of my bed. then i moved some pillows he moved back and we layed there for a while. we did make out and fooled around a lil. lots of laughter and lots of holding.. 

he told me the difference between friends that date and people you date. I was told not to completely shut him out and if i have to to call him and tell him whats going on with me. then to do that. Then i was told nothing depressing or negative anymore.. it really hit me right then when all this was said. I dunno what to think about it. I know sometimes u have to look at the flip side but at that moment i really didn't want to cause i spent the last two days looking at the flip side to everything.

I don't need any more vivid dreams about him. and ones i am actually remembering.sometimes i wish i could go back to dreaming about stuff i never remembered the next day. I don't need all his attention or time thats for sure. but i would things to be like they were. you know a phone call once in a blue moon because he wants to tell me something. or an im just to bs around nothing serious nothing deep.. i had enough of tapping into my emotions for a LONG time. I had and heard enough drama and shit that i think if i hear or have any more i'm gonna scream. I miss hearing you so wild. 

I know not this week but the week after I'm gonna try to start some craft projects to keep me busy after i clean up my "cave" and in periods of this week and next i'm gonna look for a job. i dunno what else i can really think of. I am not depressed about my situation involving him. i am more so bumed about school and bored to death so i needs me a job.

<lj-cut>a convo between me and a friend about something i do..: 

 chuckles61032: I rubed his shoulders for no real reason 
K: ah.
chuckles61032: i am like that. i knew how he wanted me to rub his braids while before he left he was watching the parkers sitting on the edge of the bed I got behind him and started rubbing his shoulders. I saw his head move forward and back and i quit 
k: LoL
chuckles61032: i didn't know if he was enjoying it or not 
chuckles61032: but I am like that its one of my things
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
chuckles61032: he wanted me to rub his braids some more and i was like well i really don't want to cause i knew he was tired..
K: LoL he would've fell asleep in your arms.
chuckles61032: more like in my lap. 
chuckles61032: I am like that though you know that song cater to u. thats what i am like 
K: LoL.</lj-cut>


<lj-cut text="what i like about him">
what i like about him:
-how when I am feeling down he knows the right thing to do/say to make me laugh.
-his hugs 
-his kisses/ thick lips. 
-just being happy when I am with him. 
-watching movies together 
-talking about anything
-the look he gets on his face when i hestate to kiss him/or when i laugh b/c of something that he did
-hearing him tell me that everything is gonna be ok/ small lectures about things (cause if i think that if i have to explain something to him its not worth doing it) 
-him playing with my hair/rubbing my shoulders for no real reason 
-tackling me to get a sweat shirt out of my hands and then falling on the bed laughing. 
-trapped in the closet 
-cuddling 
-his smile 
-his impressions 
-listening to/watching him sing/dance in his car 
- the voice i hear on the phone (the i'm so cool and laid back that it doesn't matter) 
-how mellow he gets when his braids are being rubbed. 
-his cologne 
-when he is serious about something. 
-his style (always looks sharp) 
 what i don't like about him: 
-some of the lectures that he can give i know he doesn't mean it but its just the way he can say things sometimes.

entire reason for posting this entry: i want him to know that when it comes to him I am confused. because of how we go from one thing to another then back to one thing. I also want him to know i am not in the best of moods right now and it has nothing to do with him. all I am asking of him is if he shows up and i look like i've been crying not to sit and tell me everything is gonna be ok. sometimes i need to cry sometimes i need to scream/vent/yell and most of the time I don't want to hear anything about how things will get better and how sometimes failures happen.

me: cory say's he's attracted to me because of the chemistry we had.. I don't remember having that great of a chemistry with him One of my friends: Lo One of my friends: L me: i was always saying NO CORY One of my friends: did you have the class together? One of my friends: LoL me: no. we only talked at lunch and in the morning One of my friends: and now you're always saying NO CORY! me: yea but when we get together we have an issue with keep our hands to ourselves.. and he says i'm jumpy but when you know someone has the top of your pants pulled away from your body and you hear ooo gurl look at those.. its kind like yea i wonder why I am jumpy One of my friends: hey, he's a guy. maybe he doesn't get it. me: LOL its even worse when were sitting there and we both have to say we really need to stop but never do . me: and i learned to say stop before i say don't me: wednesday i said don't then like a 5 second pause said stop. One of my friends: LoL. One of my friends: so stop works better. me: not really. me: I figured. as long as i say no. stop, don't he should get it One of my friends: yeah One of my friends: cause no means no me: but watch next time i'll forget and say no don't stop One of my friends: LoL me: i get asked are you ok.. and if i don't answer i hear you never talk to me One of my friends: LoL me: i should be the one saying you never talk to me One of my friends: then say too much. One of my friends: LoL me: i tell him what he wants to hear until i want him to stop.. then i just don't tell him why me: but when we were kissing I hestated.. but other times he would just start smiling. One of my friends: LoL One of my friends: you're 1 smart cookie. me: yea.. i read in a book that guys like to hear how something feels. One of my friends: i find it's easier to tell people what they want to hear instead of telling them the truth. One of my friends: ah. me: yea now if i could learn to fake something we'd be great LOL.. i'm just kidding One of my friends: LoL me: you didn't have to listen to him.. One of my friends: the trick to pretend you're listening to someone is... me: smile and nod One of my friends: when he's talking, don't listen to everything, but on occasion, listen to a few words, and throw them back at him. me: its hard to do that with him.. One of my friends: like wait, you said the new job was in burmingham (hyst) right? like what's it next to? One of my friends: oh. me: I think over all the worse part was i told him i didn't want a lecture and he gives me one One of my friends: nm them. One of my friends: ugh. *then... One of my friends: LoL. One of my friends: i'd say try reverse psychology but i think that may backfire... me: he saw the cuts and goes did the cat win? and i was looking at the tv. and he goes.. i'm not stupid. and i kept looking at the tv and jsut said i don't want a lecture. he goes i won't give you one and i tell him everything he wanted to know and he holds me puts his head on top of mine and gives me a small lecture me: if you can't win an agruement confuse them One of my friends: LoL One of my friends: i was watching yes dear. the guy was right. One of my friends: women always win... me: recently Cory has always been right and he makes me admit it to him me: and i give him the satisfaction because he won't go on to something else until i say your right One of my friends: LoL me: when we agrue we don't think. guys agrue they thing me: *think. me: where as we bring up things they did years ago that have nothing to do with the arguement they stay on topic. One of my friends: LoL. me: i just give cory the satisfaction now. me: my pillow smells like him.. me: makes me miss him One of my friends: LoL One of my friends: sorry. me: not your fault. its the one i use at night to lay my head on One of my friends: bunch up some pillows, spray some of his cologne on them and pretend it's him. me: LOL no. me: that shit gets strong One of my friends: ah me: after our first date i changed and the next day was wearing an old navy shirt and blue jeans. i still smelled him.. One of my friends: LoL me: i took a shower and the smell was gone. One of my friends: then you wish you hadn't... me: nope i was happy i had cause i didn't want to be thinking of him when i was unpacking. me: one of the movers that was flirting with me.. OH SO HOT> me: and i reached to get some clothes got a wiff of corys cologne and i started thinking of him One of my friends: LoL me: now when I go to sleep i get a wiff of the cologne and i think and dream of him One of my friends: awww me: my step dad ssays thats why guys wear cologne and what i should do is buy cory a bottle of cologne that i like me: and that everytime cor shows up he would probably wear it. me: like i told him i like his hair braided.. now everytime i see himhis hair is braided. and i like to see it fro'ed out atleast once One of my friends: LoL One of my friends: tell'em i bet next time it'd be fro-ed out. me: it isn't wrong.. i told him before that if his hair was fro'ed out i'd run my fingers though it because i like how it feels ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- me: have you heard the new mary j blige song? One of my friends: which one? me: be without you One of my friends: yeah. me: i hate the video love the song One of my friends: LoL me: that song i was telling you about i heard it today. me: I am turning into a cuddler. One of my friends: LoL me: i can't lie to him me: i tried.. and he caught me cause i couldn't look at him One of my friends: LoL. One of my friends: practice in front of the mirror. me: lol i can lie to anyone except if i really care about them One of my friends: oh. One of my friends: good habit. me: adan we made a thing to always tell the truth One of my friends: ah me: i had to explain why i cut myself. me: I am a control freak when it comes to me. If something that happens that is beyond my control it really bothers me. also i do it because i get numb and angry at myself. me: and i have told him before i have trouble expressing myself. me: I don't do it often One of my friends: ah me: hope your chocolate break is a good one One of my friends: LoL One of my friends: it was... me: ok me: if i have chocolate it means one of two things One of my friends: ah me: yea sad.. One of my friends: Lo One of my friends: ugh... One of my friends: LoL me: yep, wednesday there was a def. need for chocolate after he left.. I've been playing SIMS 2 like crazy the last couple of days.. That and I went to walmart today to get a small poster frame for a picture my mom gave me of some town in Germany, it came with a tin that she bought a while back. I figured when i get the rest of my pictures up on the wall (next monday), they're gonna go in the space where i couldn't reach by my closet. I will take a picture of it when i have it done so y'all can see what I'm talking about. we have high celings so lots of wall space to work with.. it Rocks.. specally if your like me and have tons of posters and pictures that you like to keep displayed.

I also had to get my mom a card cause her b-day is on the 22nd. I would have gotten my bro one but i dunno when he's coming home from Iraq. I know its sometime this month but no idea if he's coming back to the states or going right back to Germany.

I have been forcing myself to work out. I have to force myself when I am not motivated to do it.. My push ups are getting better.. and my sit ups are going better. i also do jumping jacks and tae-bo..

I've been feeling pretty crappy since yesterday. What concerns me the most is the fact that he thinks that he makes me mad or frusterated or irrate.. He doesn't..  I opened up about something that i don't really share with people cause I know they'll judge me. then He comes back tonight with some thingmabout how people never listen or pay attention to what he says. I DO!! 

I don't talk about sex with him because i remember who I'm talking to and I clam up or shut down. yea its something I guess i need to work on when it comes to covering topics with him. I know i corked up (thats how he put it) on tuesday when we were talking about where his hand was the previous week.. I said I just moved it back cause he asked "was that so bad" and I didn't wanna hear it. then he wanted to know if it was and I noticed a car in front of us and made a comment about it.. But where his hand was actually wasn't bad.. 

it was sad to hear that he's not as attracted as he was but still is attracted. I don't know if I still feel the same "like" as I did.. I know that the kisses on the lips need to stop because one day one person isn't gonna feel the same anymore and its gonna break the others heart (i'm tearing up as I type this, because of just the thought of it bothers me). I enjoy kissing him don't get me wrong. 

I once told him that the max time I could ever be mad at him is 10 secs. because after those 10 seconds he has me doubled over in laughter.. He said he was gonna shorten that time to 5 seconds. the 10 second rule still stands because i keep thinking of all the sweet gesters that he does and how much he makes me laugh.I was mad at him once and mad at myself at the same time for being mad at him. The main point of me being mad was the hypocrit he was being, I forgot to remember that he forgets a lot of things. 

I care deeply and right now it hurts.. I have to get this out of me right now because I don't think I'll be able to sleep until I do. I hate when I feel like we are argueing or fighting. He once told me that it bothers him that I feel like we argue. 

I remember the First time I heard his voice in 3 years, that was a nice thing.. Mainly we talked about my music preferences but it was just so comforting to hear him. 

I enjoy anytime I get to spend with him now, I don't even care what we do. Thats weird to me because in high school sometimes I couldn't wait to get away from him, but he said he was sorry for how he came at me. 

If i had one wish I would wish that he was as attracted to me as he was when I first asked him.. :(( 

I'm gonna go now..

atleast that was the first words out of my mouth. I realize how stupid I sounded last night. This has been stressful with college and all thats going on. But as MLK said (i think it was him) We shall over come. If i'm wrong sorry.

Kay is probably still up in Philly so I doubt I'll be hearing from her.

Well atleast thats when I come down from my caffine high.. 

I hate when people hand out stuff over by The Hub.. Its like dude their just gonna throw it away right after you give it to them.. 

20 days and counting.. I get to go home to alabama and chill out for a couple of weeks before (hopefully) coming back here.. Just what I am looking forward to.. 

I get to be blind for atleast one more day becuase mail on the coast is running late and my glasses had to be sent off.. GRR. I mean I can but when a person speaks fast its like Damn dude.. 

So right now I am sitting in my "jail cell" (dorm) getting ready to fall asleep hopefully.. I haven't been sleeping well period. During thanksgiving when I was at home I passed out at 9pm. I got 12 hours of sleep the night before.. Weird.. I guess REM thingy kicked in.

Adios

For Thou art with me;
My prayers and my friends, they comfort me.
Thoust givest me the answers in moments of blankness;
Thou anointest my head with understanding.
My test paper runneth over with questions I recognize.
Surely passing grades and flying colors shall follow me
All the days of examinations;
And I shall not have to dwell in this university
Forever!... Amen

Are you tired of all those sissy "friendship" poems
that always-sound good, but never actually come close
to reality?

Well, here is a series of promises that really speaks
to true friendship:

1. When you are sad - I will help get you drunk and
plot revenge against the sorry bastard who made you
sad.

2. When you are blue - I will try to dislodge whatever
is choking you.

3. When you smile - I will know you finally got laid.

4. When you are scared - I will rag on you about it
every chance I get.

5. When you are worried - I will tell you horrible
stories about how much worse it could be and to quit
whining.

6. When you are confused - I will use little words.

7. When you are sick - Stay the hell away from me
until you are well again. I don 't want whatever you
have.

8. When you fall - I will point and laugh at your
clumsy ass

This is my oath...I pledge it till the end Why, you
may ask? Because you are my friend.
